name: Flabbi Innovations
tag_list: animation, flash, adobe, games, applications, galleries, slideshows, actionscript, design, tweening
overview:
Flabbi Innovations provides a platform for casual users and also for developers to share and innovate flash apps.

With two sections,fullyFlashed—for the casual users who like to play games,view some slideshows,enjoy some funny apps and videos.

For the developers—INNOVATE presents an opportunity for them to showcase their creations. INNOVATE also has an online tutorial which is available for free ,thus enabling the wannabe programmers and flash designers to brush up on their skills.

Flabbi’s CIN or CLOUD INNOVATION NETWORK aims to bring all the flash developers in a single profile.
